programme.sub-title: What Would Dying on Every Planet Be Like?

programme.title: What If: Chase Dies in Space
programme.sub-title: What If You Fell Into Jupiter?
programme.desc: We don't know for sure what Jupiter's core is made of. But we do know that Jupiter is the largest and oldest planet in our Solar System.

programme.title: What If: Chase Dies in Space
programme.sub-title: What If You Spent a Nanosecond in a Black Hole?
programme.desc: What would the outcome be if you took a leap of faith straight into a black hole? Today, I’m taking you on a journey into the heart of darkness—just one nanosecond inside a black hole.

programme.title: What If: Chase Dies in Space
programme.sub-title: What If You Fell Into Neptune?
programme.desc: Today I'm going to make a dive into the darkest depths of Neptune, all the way to its core. I'm going to show you some crazy violent winds and you'll see why Neptune can make you real rich.

programme.title: What If: Chase Dies in Space
programme.sub-title: What If You Spent 5 Seconds on Io?
